mapper.sql: sys_patrol_record_id, sys_staff_id, patrol_record_begintime, patrol_record_endtime, patrol_record_picture, patrol_record_video, patrol_record_gps, patrol_record_detail, roadName
mapper.insert: insert into patrolrecord (sys_patrol_record_id, sys_staff_id, patrol_record_begintime, patrol_record_endtime, patrol_record_picture, patrol_record_video, patrol_record_gps, patrol_record_detail, roadName) values (#{sysPatrolRecordId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sysStaffId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{patrolRecordBegintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{patrolRecordEndtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{patrolRecordPicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patrolRecordVideo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patrolRecordGps,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patrolRecordDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roadName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into patrolrecord
sys_patrol_record_id,
sys_staff_id,
patrol_record_begintime,
patrol_record_endtime,
patrol_record_picture,
patrol_record_video,
patrol_record_gps,
patrol_record_detail,
roadName,
#{sysPatrolRecordId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{sysStaffId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{patrolRecordBegintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{patrolRecordEndtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{patrolRecordPicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{patrolRecordVideo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{patrolRecordGps,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{patrolRecordDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{roadName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update patrolrecord
sys_staff_id = #{sysStaffId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
patrol_record_begintime = #{patrolRecordBegintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
patrol_record_endtime = #{patrolRecordEndtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
patrol_record_picture = #{patrolRecordPicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
patrol_record_video = #{patrolRecordVideo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
patrol_record_gps = #{patrolRecordGps,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
patrol_record_detail = #{patrolRecordDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
roadName = #{roadName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where sys_patrol_record_id = #{sysPatrolRecordId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update patrolrecord set sys_staff_id = #{sysStaffId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, patrol_record_begintime = #{patrolRecordBegintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, patrol_record_endtime = #{patrolRecordEndtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, patrol_record_picture = #{patrolRecordPicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, patrol_record_video = #{patrolRecordVideo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, patrol_record_gps = #{patrolRecordGps,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, patrol_record_detail = #{patrolRecordDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, roadName = #{roadName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where sys_patrol_record_id = #{sysPatrolRecordId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM patrolrecord p,staff f,section s WHERE p.sys_staff_id=f.sys_staff_id and f.sys_section_id=s.sys_section_id ORDER BY patrol_record_begintime DESC
SELECT * FROM patrolrecord WHERE patrol_record_video!="" ORDER BY patrol_record_begintime DESC

SELECT * FROM section s,patrolrecord pr,staff sf WHERE sf.sys_section_id=s.sys_section_id AND pr.sys_staff_id=sf.sys_staff_id sf.sys_section_id=#{sysSectionId} AND sf.staff_hierarchy='二级路长' order by patrol_record_begintime DESC
SELECT d.suty_road,r.* FROM duty d,road r WHERE d.sys_road_id=r.sys_road_id and onestaff_id=#{StaffId}
SELECT d.suty_road,r.* FROM duty d,road r WHERE d.sys_road_id=r.sys_road_id and twostaff_id=#{twostaffId}
SELECT * FROM patrolrecord order by sys_patrol_record_id DESC limit 1;
select * FROM patrolrecord p WHERE p.sys_staff_id=#{id} order by sys_patrol_record_id desc

SELECT * FROM patrolrecord p,staff f WHERE p.sys_staff_id=f.sys_staff_id AND TO_DAYS(p.patrol_record_begintime) = TO_DAYS(NOW()) AND p.sys_staff_id =#{staffid} AND p.patrol_record_endtime is null GROUP BY p.sys_staff_id

SELECT * FROM patrolrecord p,staff f,section s WHERE f.sys_section_id=s.sys_section_id and f.sys_staff_id=p.sys_staff_id and to_days(p.patrol_record_begintime) = to_days(now()) AND p.patrol_record_gps is NOT NULL AND p.sys_staff_id=#{id} ORDER BY p.patrol_record_begintime DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.update:
update patrolrecord
patrol_record_endtime = null,
sys_staff_id = #{sysStaffId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
patrol_record_begintime = #{patrolRecordBegintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
patrol_record_endtime = #{patrolRecordEndtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
patrol_record_picture = #{patrolRecordPicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
patrol_record_video = #{patrolRecordVideo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
patrol_record_gps = #{patrolRecordGps,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
patrol_record_detail = #{patrolRecordDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
roadName = #{roadName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where sys_patrol_record_id = #{sysPatrolRecordId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT sys_staff_id FROM patrolrecord where (patrol_record_endtime is null or patrol_record_endtime = '') and (sys_staff_id != '' or sys_staff_id is not null) GROUP BY sys_staff_id

SELECT g.*,f.*,x.* FROM gps g,staff f,section s,xarea x,xrelation xl where g.sys_staff_id=f.sys_staff_id and f.sys_section_id=s.sys_section_id and f.sys_staff_id = xl.staff_id and xl.xarea_id = x.id and g.sys_staff_id = #{id} ORDER BY gps_time DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT * FROM gps g,staff f,section s where g.sys_staff_id=f.sys_staff_id and f.sys_section_id=s.sys_section_id and to_days(g.gps_time) = to_days(#{time}) and g.sys_staff_id = #{id} ORDER BY gps_time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT * from patrolrecord WHERE sys_staff_id=#{id} AND TO_DAYS(patrol_record_begintime) = TO_DAYS(NOW())
select gps,centre from xarea where type = '面' and centre is not null and centre != '' and gps != '' and gps is not null
select x.gps,x.centre,xl.staff_id from xarea x,xrelation xl where x.type = #{type} and (x.gps != '' or x.gps!=null) and x.gps is not null and xl.xarea_id = x.id GROUP BY xl.staff_id
